title: Lotto results LIVE: Winning numbers for Saturday's £3.8million jackpot
text:
An incredible £3.8million jackpot is up for grabs in tonight's Lotto draw.

Your money worries could be over forever if you win the huge prize on Saturday October 19.

The biggest ever Lotto winner was created in April 2016, when an anonymous player banked £35m in the draw.

In January 2016, two lucky Lotto ticket-holders walked away with a staggering £33 million each.

The Lotto results are typically drawn at 7.45pm and the Thunderball is drawn at 8.15pm.

Stick with us for the results this evening.
description: Join us tonight to find out the National Lottery winning numbers for Saturday October 19
